page.title: 06HOUSING-1 DUNTON GREEN
page.content: Housing in the area varies widely in price. In Dunton Green houses at the North end tend to be dearer than ones at the South end, and some 25% of the housing is Council Housing. Nearly all housing here is brick-built and pre-1960, some much earlier. D.G. also has a caravan site. NW Otford & Chipstead have more private estates, many built in the 1960's & later. Building materials there include tiles & some boarding. {House prices}in our block advertised on one day ranged from Â£47950 to Â£128500. Average price in Chipstead was about Â£98000. 3 & 4 bedroomed houses were common, some had 5, a few 2. Some had full double-glazing & central heating & that raised prices. Fully equipped kitchens & double garages also affected price.
